name: Togabito no Senritsu
overview: “Togabito no Senritsu” is a psycho suspense adventure game, dealing with loss and death associated with a murder title. In this death game, several are trapped in prison, and they’ll need to work together to escape. Throughout the experience, characters give into their selfish nature and uncover the sins of their past. Belief and bonds in extreme conditions, hate and love, and the story of defeat and victory are just some of the elements players will encounter.
